text: Sayyad-e Shirazi Metro Station is a station of Mashhad Metro Line 1. The station opened on 10 October 2011. It is located on Vakilabad Expressway. It is named after the assassinated Ali Sayad Shirazi, chief-of-staff of the Iranian Armed Forces during the eight-year Iran–Iraq war. ==References== Category:Mashhad Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Iran
title: Sayyad-e-Shirazi Metro Station (Mashhad Metro)
